mods.abstract: Enclosures Nos. 3-4 to Despatch No. 9 from the Secret Department, Bombay Castle, dated 12 March 1860. The Enclosures are dated 2-18 February 1860. Received 5 April 1860.The Enclosures consist of reports on Aden by Captain Robert Lambert Playfair, First Assistant Political Resident, in charge of Residency, Aden, and Brigadier William Marcus Coghlan, Political Resident and Commandant, Aden, dated February 1860.The reports cover: an offer of the sale or lease by a party of tribal chiefs of certain islands that were said to contain a valuable deposit of guano; a tribal feud; telegraphic communications; and the arrival of a French corvette.
